resources:
CheckLOD Internet connection is not stabled.\n\n Please check internet connections. Error occured during connection. \n Would you like to reconnect? Close an application. Datas of completed delivery will be removed. Would you like to close?
CheckLOD can be used without extra sign-up because it collects cellular number and compares with the registered cellular numbers in the company. Thus, CheckLOD requests necessary permission. CheckLOD can not be used when it refused. Would you like to continue? This permission can be reset in Settings>Application>CheckLOD>Permissions
초기화 영어
CheckLOD requests permission for using NFC tagging. The function may be deactivated when it refused. This permission can be reset in Settings>Application>CheckLOD>Permissions.
Permission of location is required for CheckLOD BLE signal communication. Permissions of Camera and Picture library are also required for taking picture of documents and transmission. If those are refused, CheckLOD cannot be used. Would you like to continue? Those permissions can be reset in Settings>Application>CheckLOD>Permissions.
CheckLOD may not be proceeded when the permission has been refused. This permission can be reset in Settings>Application>CheckLOD>Permissions
Set the CheckLOD as main display.Please select CheckLOD within the list of below.
Restore home screen as a default. Please select home screen without CheckLOD.
The beacon is not registered. Please ask manager Temperature range of beacon no.%s has not been initialized Status of beacon no.%s is not \'RUNNING\' Temperature of beacon no.%s is not stabled
Start new trip
Take existed trip
Take Cargo trip
cancel
Fix the CheckLOD on the Home screen for data communication during the delivery. Please select [Home Screen > CheckLOD] on the following menu.
Delivery item is empty. Restore home screen as default. Please check and select the other home screen on the list of [Home screen].
Delete the datas of beacon no.%s on the list and the cellular. Would you like to continue?
The Application is normally operated when bluetooth activated The Application is normally operated when NFC activated as default This cellular is not supported for BLE communication
Necessary permission has been agreed
Importing Import previous trip datas
Delivery is in progress. \n The App can not run into background. Cellular for the automobiles only for the CheckLOD Application will be running in the background when backword button is touched Application will be closed when backword button is touched Necessary information of server can not be loaded Hello. Tasks are ready. Temperature range for beacon has not been initialized. Status of beacon is not RUN Starts when temperatures of registerd bicons has been stabled This is not registered cellular. Ask manager Put sticker number of registerd beacon Will be started automatically after %s minutes Other tasks are not be able to when delay start has been set Network is connected through Wi-Fi. Recommand to use mobile network with turning Wi-Fi off. Battery only reamins %s.Recommand to recharge. The storage only remains for %s. Please delete other files for big size of pictures or videos. Network is not connected. Please check the connection. Tag the beacon or enter the beacon using [+] button.
Beacon Number Cellular No enter cancel
This beacon is already tracking.
%s (%s) Maximum %s℃ Minimum %s℃ Average %s℃ Chipset-%s Temperature range No settings Takeover expected Delivery information Delete
The delivery(beacon) is imported to another cellular. The delivery has completed but invoice has not sent The delivery has completed and invoice has sent. Takeover cargo shipment Delete invoice transmission Total delivery time : %s, Lost : %s ea, % of lost : %s Total delivery time : %s position value Finish delivery Takeovered to other cellular Delivery finished invoice transmission
Delivery is completed. Exit and prepare new task. Start extra trips Reset the task Check data Please check the status as \'RUN\' of beacon no.%s \n Version of CheckLOD is [ %s ]
Finish the transmission of temperature data. Would you like to continue? Invoice will be able to transmit to finish trackings by \'Finish delivery\' Delivery datas are empty. Delivery datas are empty. Will you complete this delivery item?
Delivery process has been completed. Failed to transmit invoice
Select the task of completed delivery
Takeover and complete the trip
Cargo shipment and take trip
Would you like to delete no.%s ? Transmittable photo is empty
Finish the data transmission on the cellular but session of server remains
Please enter the cellular number and beacon number on the below.
Data transmission of no.%s has finished. Take a picture of invoice and transmit it.
Take a picture
Select from gallery
Trip for Cargo shipment may not be started with other trips Cannot start of takeover in Cargo shipment. After changing status of beacon as \'RDY\' shown in below, push \'Lnk\' button to update status of beacon ready to connect. Please check beacon information below, then set temperature range Next step Transfer transmitted data Receive beacon data Reconnect to beacon Receiving datas from beacon Transmit the received data from beacon to server Failed to connect to beacon Initialize beacon data Disconnect to beacon Reset the task to start delivery No remaining datas No logger signals exists. Please check the power of beacon.
The cellular for automobiles should be always charged with cables.Please connect charge cable to cellular. Please check the status of beacon No.%s. The status is not \'RUNNING\'.
Checking frequency of beacon No.%s is longer than a minute. 5 minutes report may be accurate when maximum checking frequency is a minute.
%d hors,%d minutes,%d seconds
Upload Upload images...
Select task.
